execution_quality: Agent systematically gathered git status, diffs, and log information before creating a commit with appropriate message and co-author attribution. Followed established git safety protocols.
work_category: Git commit workflow task where agent gathered repository state information and created a commit with changes. Used standard git operations to stage and commit modifications.
summary: Agent successfully completed a straightforward git commit task by gathering repository state, analyzing changes, and creating a well-formed commit with proper attribution. The session ended without feedback, suggesting the user was satisfied with the execution and the commit was accepted as intended.
follow_up_pattern: Session ended without follow-up, indicating the user either accepted the commit result or moved on to other work.
